thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Wall Street’s Trading Desks Are Making a Comeback

author: Telis Demos
title: Wall Street’s Trading Desks Are Making a Comeback
text:
Following wild price swings for markets in the first quarter, Wall Street’s trading desks are poised to report one of their best three-month periods in years.
While no one is expecting a new peak in trading like the ones that occurred in 2009 and shortly before the financial crisis, the trading desks of the biggest U.S. banks are expected report revenue as much as 5% higher than a year ago, say analysts at Credit Suisse. Analysts at Jefferies are a bit more optimistic, saying that trading results, which sometimes make or break... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
